title: Old looking typeface?
content:
I need a font that resembles hand-painted sign lettering or looks like a commercial typeface from the 20s or 30s, preferably free or at minimal cost. The font will be used to replace the lettering on a truck door in a vintage photo.

Thanks in advance for any help!
author: ho72

comments.content:
Here is the text as it is now:

[http://www.pixentral.com/pics/1equ628qFddnI1ilr1q0xB40Z4HgJZ.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110025133/http:/www.pixentral.com/pics/1equ628qFddnI1ilr1q0xB40Z4HgJZ.jpg)
Also look at Mark Simonsonâ€™s Mostra you can see a sampling at MyFonts. It it has to be free go to DaFonts and search.
